title: Charlie Walk - The One Thing That Everything Great Needs
itunes:title: Charlie Walk - The One Thing That Everything Great Needs
description:
Who’s your favorite musician? Whoever it is, today’s guest has likely worked with them. But figuring out the formula for success in any medium means doing the work to dig down past the glitz and the bright lights.
 
Charlie Walk is one of the most revered names in music industry history. Over the course of his career, Charlie has worked with artists like Shakira, Taylor Swift, Lorde and Enrique Iglesias - just to name a few. After years working for huge corporations, he broke away to create his own music mentorship program called Music Mastery.
 
On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Charlie dig into Charlie’s unconventional rise to the top as a producer, why having a team is vital for actual success (no matter who you are), the need for “human touch” in tech, and finding your individual starship. Tune in for wisdom from a man who has engineered insane amounts of success for decades. 
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/charlie-walk
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
